main event: A UFO was observed in Plattsburg, New York on April 1, 1964.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 15 seconds,The object was described as black with a definite shape like a bright star,The object was seen to move in a straight line until it curved south east,The witnesses reported that it exhibited erratic motion and could stand still,The sighting was considered to correlate with the passage of a satellite (ECHO II).
witness description: The witness described the object as black and brighter than the North Star, exhibiting very fast erratic motion.
